bibl.note: P.CtYBR [= P. Yale] Inv. 4635 r. Arsinoite nome?, first half of the 2nd century BCE? - The Nature of the Document. - Appendix: The Provenance of P.CtYBR Inv. 4635 [about the possible illegal character of the acquisition of the papyrus in 1996/1997]
